name: Bethany House Domestic Violence Shelter
description: Emergency shelter and support services for victims of domestic violence. Provides safe housing, counseling, legal advocacy, and transportation assistance to help survivors rebuild their lives.
source: Verified from official website and phone call on 2024-01-15
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
eligibility_requirements: Victims of domestic violence and their children. Must be fleeing an abusive situation.
populations_served: Women, children, families affected by domestic violence
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. Organization provides emergency shelter, counseling, legal advocacy, and transportation services for domestic violence survivors. Phone number confirmed working. Website verified current. 24/7 crisis hotline available.
